talk.chat:
Sentry Roselyn:
The temple serves Shilen, mother of the abyss. It is not only a sacred temple where rituals are held for the goddess, but also a place where young Dark Elves learn discipline, basic combat skills and magic.
Within the deepest parts of the temple lies Patriarch Mitraell. To get to the temple, go up to the surface and then just a bit to the left.

Sentry Roselyn:
May the blessing of darkness shelter you. I am Sentry Roselyn, one of the members of the glorious corps of sentries, who protect the Temple of Shilen and guard her people.
This path that I am in charge of leads to the surface. Follow the path and go outside to get to the most sacred site for our race, the Temple of Shilen.
Ask about the Shilen Temple.
See the Lord and get the tax rate information.
Quest
